title: Client Issue
body: Ive been having this issue where after the client updates, i press launch but it just closes it instead{{item:3073}}

replies.body: This can happen if a setting is blocking the patcher from launching.  Dry those tears, the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help by adding League as an exception.  :D

i tried these things a few times before, when the update finishes it looks as though it never updated to begin with, is there a way to just download the current client without having to go through the update process?{{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}
Nope, the patcher is the only way to get updated game files.  Based on this info, does that mean your patcher is appearing now?  Are you getting any other errors?

i'm not sure what you mean by "patcher" exactly but it doesn't go any further than the client update process and does not start updating the version of the game, as far as any other errors there are none that i am aware of at the moment

The patcher is the client just before the login screen.  It connects you to our patching service to check that you're online and for updates, then transitions to the login screen.  If the permissions guide hasn't help, be sure to restart your PC too in case something in the background crashed.

Otherwise, let our tech team help out directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Just download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs for context, and attach it to your ticket.  We will see you there!  :D
